reviewText:
It is a sweet story of the English gentlemen-businessman of the early twentieth century, taking a care of an orphaned sixteen year old boy in the middle of the forest road.

As lad's attraction to a young fellow deepened, a boy became a girl-on-run of whom gratitude to a supporter grown into a marriage through love triangles and alcove affairs.

Highly recommended for hight school pupils improving their really original English accent especially.
